content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Welcome to Arcadia</>
content.text:
üåø <TextStyle.LightBlue>Arcadia</> is a <TextStyle.Green>PvE Crossplay</> server for <TextStyle.White>ARK: Survival Ascended</>.

üî± Inspired by Greek mythology, focused on:
‚Ä¢ Long-term gameplay
‚Ä¢ No wipes
‚Ä¢ Quality of Life
‚Ä¢ Fair and friendly community

‚ö†Ô∏è Press <TextStyle.Orange>F1</> anytime to re-open this menu.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>üö´ General Rules</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Respect all players and admins
‚Ä¢ No harassment, racism or toxicity
‚Ä¢ No cheating, exploits, duping or meshing
‚Ä¢ English only in global chat
‚Ä¢ Admin decisions are final

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>üèóÔ∏è Building Rules</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Do not block resource spawns
‚Ä¢ No blocking obelisks, drops or artifacts
‚Ä¢ Artifact caves are restricted
‚Ä¢ Keep base size reasonable
‚Ä¢ Structure decay is <TextStyle.Green>ENABLED</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>ü¶ñ Dino Rules</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ No aggressive dinos on wander
‚Ä¢ Cryo unused dinos
‚Ä¢ No excessive breeding (lag breeding)
‚Ä¢ Follow dino caps if enforced

content.title: <TextStyle.LightBlue>üåç Server Rates</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ XP Gain: <TextStyle.Green>x5</>
‚Ä¢ Harvesting: <TextStyle.Green>x10</>
‚Ä¢ Taming Speed: <TextStyle.Green>x15</>
‚Ä¢ Supply Crate Loot: <TextStyle.Green>x5</>
‚Ä¢ Fishing Loot: <TextStyle.Green>x5</>

content.title: <TextStyle.LightBlue>ü¶ñ Player & Dino Settings</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Max Wild Dino Level: <TextStyle.Green>150</>
‚Ä¢ Player Weight: <TextStyle.Green>Boosted</>
‚Ä¢ Dino Weight: <TextStyle.Green>Boosted</>
‚Ä¢ Faster Crafting
‚Ä¢ Reduced Food & Water Drain

content.title: <TextStyle.LightBlue>üß¨ Breeding Timers</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Mating Cooldown: <TextStyle.Green>Very Short</>
‚Ä¢ Egg Hatch Speed: <TextStyle.Green>x25</>
‚Ä¢ Baby Maturation: <TextStyle.Green>x40</>
‚Ä¢ Imprint Interval: <TextStyle.Green>~8 minutes</>
‚Ä¢ Full Imprint: <TextStyle.Green>Always Possible</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Important Gameplay Info</>
content.text:
üß± <TextStyle.Yellow>Cybers Structures (CS)</>
‚Ä¢ Use CS Forge instead of vanilla forge
‚Ä¢ Faster crafting & pull systems enabled

ü¶ñ <TextStyle.Yellow>Dino Depot</>
‚Ä¢ Dino Balls supported
‚Ä¢ Imprinting supported

üì¶ <TextStyle.Yellow>Sprinkles</>
‚Ä¢ Item pulling enabled
‚Ä¢ Pull Range: <TextStyle.Green>90 foundations</>

‚ö†Ô∏è Always use mod structures when available.
